alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 6:01PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Dropping temperatures and slick roadways are expected this evening... Temperatures in the teens and lower 20s combined with lingering light snow shower activity will create slick roadways this evening across portions of northern Nevada. Lack of solar heating is causing road temperatures to quickly fall below freezing which will allow a refreezing of existing moisture on road surfaces. Additional isolated snow showers will bring up to half an inch of new snow in some cases but significant widespread snow accumulation is not expected. Expect slick and icy road conditions that will make travel very difficult, especially on untreated surfaces. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
